name: Inorbital.
description:
Award-winning web design & development.
Decades of Experience
Inorbital has been delivering engaging and usable award-winning web design since 1999. Dedicated to solutions for Healthcare, Non-profits, Associations and Financial organizations. Built by a dedicated and certified team of in-house web designers and website developers based in Toronto Canada.
Proven Process
We apply our 6 step methodology which incorporates Scrum combined with established project tools like JIRA to keep everyone on track and totally transparent. This process ensures budgets, schedules and best practise are adhered to along with well thought-out workplan.
Fantastic Technology
Taking advantage of Microsoft .NET framework powered by the Kentico enterprise Content Management system to power “responsive” mobile optimized websites. Comes fully loaded with event registration and donation forms, intranets, social media integration, ecommerce, accessible AODA compliant, 3rd party Integration and robust membership management tools.
